data.event: The population was 22,866 at the 2000 census, and had grown to 24,413 as of 2010.
The city was founded in July 1901 by John Alexander Dowie.
It was built in the early 1900s and burned down in 1937.
It was built in the early 1900s and burned down in 1937.

event.title: is located at 42°27′12″N 87°50′25″W. According to the 2010

data.event: Zion is located at 42°27′12″N 87°50′25″W. According to the 2010 census, Zion has a total area of 9.813 square miles (25.42 km2), of which 9.81 square miles (25.41 km2) (or 99.97%) is land and 0.003 square miles (0.01 km2) (or 0.03%) is water.
